description: Patch Plan for Proposal ID 14: Improve UI Interaction Coverage

operations.content:
# Test for cancel button
@patch('app.ui_components.CancelButton.click', return_value=True)
@patch('app.ui_components.InputField.clear', return_value=None)
def test_cancel_button(self, mock_click, mock_clear):
    # Arrange
    button = CancelButton()
    input_field = InputField()

    # Act
    button.click()
    input_field.clear()

    # Assert
    mock_click.assert_called_once()
    mock_clear.assert_called_once()

# Test for cancel button
@patch('app.ui_components.CancelButton.click', return_value=True)
@patch('app.ui_components.InputField.clear', return_value=None)
def test_cancel_button(self, mock_click, mock_clear):
    # Arrange
    button = CancelButton()
    input_field = InputField()

    # Act
    button.click()
    input_field.clear()

    # Assert
    mock_click.assert_called_once()
    mock_clear.assert_called_once()
